column4: RT @UCLA Join us May 18th for our #UCLA100 Centennial Celebration, a series of events ending in a light and sound show with Royce Hall as the backdrop. The day will kick off a yearlong celebration to reflect on our past achievements and look ahead to our future. ➡️ https://t.co/p0Gvg4SWjI https://t.co/AmHfkktLn4
